caption.p: The interaction between SARS-CoV-2 and the renin-angiotensin system. The SARS-CoV-2 spike protein binding to the ACE2 receptor; S1 subunit binds to host cell and S2 subunit triggers the fusion of the viral envelope and target cell. After entry of the virus particle, surface ACE2 is further downregulated, resulting in unrestrained angiotensin II accumulation.
